name: Ceaseless (itch) (MohamedA.G)
description:
A simple 2D endless runner made in C++ using Raylib.

It is nothing special or trivial, but it is made from scratch and is a way for me to develop my programming skills. 

If you want to look at the code go to the game's GitHub page.

 GitHub: https://github.com/MohamedAG2002/Ceaseless

I don't know what else to write. It is just an endless runner with obstacles and...stuff.

ENJOY!
